website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable blood pressure monitor for the wrist that's durable.
pros: Easy to use, small, and compact
Secures to the wrist firmly, but is comfortable to wear
Equipped with memory recall software and long-lasting battery life
cons: Takes longer to deliver a reading than other similar wrist devices

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent/Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I had this cuff for 2 days. The numbers were so off. When I take multiple readings back to back, the numbers were extremely different. i.e. Reading #1: 187/113,3 seconds later Reading #2: 131/78,and in & on. Extremely unreliable considering what it's used for.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This product, when used according to directions, is quite accurate. My only criticism is that it takes a little longer to take the reading, than more expensive meters.
customer_reviews.author: KlondikeDarol

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use; but gives high readings.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use -- easier than the larger upper arm BP monitor I used in the past. But be aware that the readings are a little higher on this wrist BP monitor than on larger ones (I took this wrist monitor to my Dr's office, and compared it to their readings, and this wrist monitor's readings were about 5 points higher).
customer_reviews.author: Edward S. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to take my pressure when I was pregnant. Accurate and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Safiya Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this blood pressure monitor to be very easy to use. The readings were easy to read and I have had absolutely no problems with it after over a month's use.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stenberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, so easy to use, fits comfortably on wrist and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Blood Pressure Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Accurate readings. Very pleased with it. Comes with compact case
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy the product was to use. Very convenient. I didn't like the tightness around my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Friend

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and read provides accurate results. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anye

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I didnt care for this product. The readings are inaccurate. This product is a waste of money. Don't bother purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adelina

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use but what good is it if its nowhere close to accurate?
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dishon

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent readings.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was compact, portable. With that being said the readings were inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thrift

customer_reviews.title: works well and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: works well and very easy to use. if you are one who needs to monitor their blood pressure often, this product is a very good choice and at a good price
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: always read error no matter what position arm was....poor quality item
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: It’s so easy to measure blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It’s convenient to use. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: CC from the Lone Star State

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple of months. This product seem to work fine in the beginning, but now does not fill with air to give a reading. Disappointing as I am supposed to be tracking for 30 days. I will have to buy a new one and a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Goodhome

product_meta.title: Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor - Blood Pressure Cuff Wrist, 5.3" - 8.5" Cuff Size, 180 Readings Memory for 2 Users, Irregular Heartbeat Detection, Pulse Rate Monitoring, Black - Portable Case Included
feature_bullets: wrist blood pressure monitor has advanced measurement techniques, along with World Health Organisation (WHO) Blood Pressure Classification Indicator, each device is individually tested for guaranteed accuracy, every time. Displayed measurements include: systolic pressure, diastolic pressure, pulse rate, date, time, and user ID.

Extremely easy to use with one-button operation. Wrap the cuff around your wrist, assume proper sitting position and pressing the switch button, you will get the reading within 30 seconds. With backlight to show your measurements in clear, easy-to-read digits. The backlight makes it easy to read even in the dark.

Convenient carrying case for home and travel use. Elegant and tiny size suit for daily use, it comes with carrying case to make sure you can easily carry your BP monitor anywhere you go, and be able to record your blood pressure and heartbeat when doing various activities or traveling

This blood pressure monitor supports 2 users’ data storage and up to 99 memories for each person. Very conveniently toggle to reading the memories for each person. The measurement date and time will also be automatically recorded. Perfect to keep track of your fitness and compare trends over a period of time.

High Accuracy Measuing: ±3mmHg/±0.4kPa(blood pressure); ±5%(pulse rate).This digital blood pressure monitor device has an advanced measuring technique that gives you not just the fastest reading method but more importantly the most accurate one

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
